posts.title: Daft Punk Action Figures
posts.content: Go harder, better, faster, and stronger with your toy collection when you get your hands on these Daft Punk action figures. The iconic electronic music duo are finally in adjustable figurine form, and are looking to drop some sick beats that will rock the Barbie toy house.

posts.title: Horse Head Squirrel Feeder
posts.content: Let the squirrels in your backyard horse around while they eat from this disturbing horse head squirrel feeder. This hanging squirrel feeder makes it appear like the squirrel is wearing s small version of the horse mask while they munch away on some food.

posts.title: littleBits Avengers Hero Inventor Kit
posts.content: Make learning fun for your little inventor-in-training by surprising him with the littleBits Avengers Hero inventor kit. It’ll teach your pint-sized Tony Stark valuable STEAM skills while he builds awesome super hero accessories that he can actually play with.

posts.title: The Book With No Pictures
posts.content: The Book With No Pictures is a hilariously fun read that requires you to speak aloud whatever is written, no matter how silly or preposterous it sounds. It’s perfect for reading to children as they giggle hearing their parents say ridiculous things like “glibbity globbity”.

posts.title: Spider-Man Silly String Web Shooter
posts.content: Make your pint-sized superhero feel just like the iconic web-slinger by surprising him with this Spider-Man silly string web shooter. Simply attach the plastic mount to the Spidey styled red glove and watch him shoot out silly string like his favorite hero.

posts.title: Liquid Repellent
posts.content: Waterproofing your life may be easier than you think – all it takes is a few cans of liquid repellent. This specialized spray works on a variety of surfaces including concrete, wood, and fabric to guard against the nasty weather mother nature throws your way.

posts.title: Self-Marking Tape Measure
posts.content: Tackle DIY projects in a fraction of the time using the self-marking tape measure! The ingenious and efficient design of this self-marking tape measure incorporates a graphite tip at the bottom so that you can easily make a mark at your desired measurements.

posts.title: The League of Regrettable Supervillains
posts.content: Not every supervillain can achieve the fame and glory of icons like the Joker or Galactus. The League of Regrettable Supervillains spotlights all the strange, bizarre, and cringe-worthy bad guys ever to be published – such as MODOK, Brickcat, and Egg Fu.

posts.title: Death Star Waffle Maker
posts.content: Experience the <del>power</del> deliciousness of the Dark Side by using this Death Star waffle maker. This stainless steel waffle maker comes with a special non-stick coating and a regulation thermostat to ensure even browning.

posts.title: Seeding Squares
posts.content: Transform your barren yard into a lush and vibrant garden using these seeding squares. Ideal for any size yard, each of these compact modular squares provides you with the optimal setting for growing a variety of plants and veggies with minimal weeds.

posts.title: Jackson Pollock Jigsaw Puzzle
posts.content: How much do you hate yourself? Finding meaning in Pollock’s paintings is easier than putting together one of his jigsaw puzzles. The sense of accomplishment upon completion will be short lived after you realize you could’ve just thrown paint on blank puzzle pieces.

posts.title: Ultra Fast Barrel Aging Oak Bottle
posts.content: Give any ordinary drink an extraordinary taste using this ultra fast barrel aging oak bottle. This unique vessel is designed to accelerate the aging process, allowing you to infuse incredible aromas into your homemade beers, cocktails, spirits, or wines.
